author: Greg Bluestein
title: Walker has limited public campaign stops, but hes profited from private events

sentence: But none of those military appointments, statewide elections, or traditional Republican check-list attributes have managed to compete with the sheer celebrity of Herschel Walker since he moved back to Georgia in August and announced his run for Senate, with Donald Trump's blessing.
author: Patricia Murphy
title: OPINION: How to run for Senate when you're not Herschel Walker

sentence: This massive fundraising haul, likely the largest in the country for a non-incumbent, shows that Georgia Republicans are clearly united behind Herschel Walker and are ready to take on Senator Warnock, said his campaign manager Scott Paradise.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Herschel Walker raises another $5.4M for Senate bid

sentence: ATLANTA (AP) Republicans risk losing the U.S. Senate race if they nominate Herschel Walker, two of Walker's rivals said, citing a report by The Associated Press about how police confiscated a gun from the former football great following a domestic dispute 20 years ago.
title: Walker's past could let Warnock keep Senate seat, rivals say

sentence: (AP Photo/Ben Gray, File) ATLANTA (AP) Republicans risk losing the U.S. Senate race if they nominate Herschel Walker, two of Walker's rivals said, citing a report by The Associated Press about how police confiscated a gun from the former football great following a domestic dispute 20 years ago.
author: JEFF AMY
title: Walker's past could let Warnock keep Senate seat, rivals say

sentence: "It is time for Herschel Walker to enter through the front door, make himself available to the public and have the press do interviews that test your knowledge and skills and answer the many questions that everyone has," Black said Friday, saying Walker needs to talk about his policy positions as well as his past.
author: JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Walker's past could let Warnock keep Senate seat, rivals say

sentence: WHO'S UP AND WHO'S DOWN IN THE LATEST FOX NEWS MIDTERMS POWER RANKINGS Republican Senate candidate Kelvin King charged in comments to the Atlanta Journal Constitution that "Herschel Walker talks about working hard and fighting for the interests of Georgians, yet he works behind the scenes to ensure a level of celebrity comfort and elusiveness, separating himself from the questions and engagement that Georgians demand.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Demolition derby in Georgia as Herschel Walker's GOP primary rivals slam the Senate front-runner

sentence: While Herschel Walkers comments questioning evolution and reproductive medicine caught national attention this week, he also spoke Tuesday at the Rotary Club of Carrollton where he appeared to falsely suggest that NATO hasnt been involved in working to deter Russias invasion of Ukraine.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Its not an autograph tour. Herschel Walkers GOP opponents rip their rival

sentence: A brutal Senate primary is heating up in Georgia, where Republican Gary Blacks campaign dropped opposition research about primary opponent Herschel Walker (former President Donald Trumps pick), highlighting a lengthy list of allegations of domestic assault, threats and violence.
title: Day 22 into Russia's invasion of Ukraine: A glimmer of hope and a devastating reality

sentence: On Thursday, POLITICO Playbook reported that Herschel Walker, the former football star running for Senate in Georgia with the endorsement of former President Donald Trump, is now facing attacks from his primary challenger, state Agriculture Commissioner Gary Black, over his history of domestic violence and it has some GOP strategists privately scared about his viability in the general election.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Republicans worry about pro-Trump Senate candidate's history of domestic violence

sentence: Republican Herschel Walker holds a narrow lead over incumbent Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-GA) in a hypothetical matchup in the race for U.S. Senate in Georgia, according to a poll published Wednesday.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Herschel Walker Leads Raphael Warnock in Tight Georgia Senate Race

sentence: Former football great Herschel Walker skipped the first major Republican U.S. Senate debate, but his absence at the event in Gainesville on Saturday helped shape the back-and-forth among the five candidates who showed up.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Herschel Walkers no-show looms large over Senate GOP debate

sentence: "Herschel Walker will never let you down," Trump said in a statement last year that declared his "complete and total endorsement" for the candidate, CNN reported.
author: Zoe Strozewski
title: Herschel Walker Is Betting Favorite to Win Georgia Senate Seat

sentence: Republican Senate front-runner Herschel Walker said his campaign committees amassed $5.5 million the first three months of the year for his bid to unseat Democratic U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Herschel Walkers campaign raises $5.5M for Senate bid

sentence: Football icon and Georgia Republican Herschel Walker said Friday that his U.S. Senate campaign had raised $5.5 million in the first three months of 2022, a big haul that is still dwarfed by the $13.6 million that Democratic incumbent Raphael Warnock raised in the same period.
title: Walker raises $5.5M in Georgia Senate race, trailing Warnock

sentence: Somehow former football player and Republican Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker is still convincing folks that hes the man for the job.
author: Angela Johnson
title: Herschel Walker Endorsed by Pro-Life Organization

sentence: Senate candidate Herschel Walker has spent years promoting and developing health-conscious products with dubious benefits and a skepticism from the medical community, a review by The Atlanta Journal-Constitution has found.
author: Dylan Jackson
title: Herschel Walker spent years promoting health products with dubious claims

sentence: One of the problems also is if Brian Kemp gets in, I think it's going to be very, very hard for Herschel Walker to win,? Mr. Trump said, according to the Atlanta Journal-Constitution.
author: Seth McLaughlin
title: Herschel Walker's debate avoidance in primary spurs general election questions

sentence: Tuesdays debate among Georgia Republican Senate candidates was predictably defined by the man who wasnt there Herschel Walker.
title: Georgia GOP Senate debate focuses on Herschel Walker absence

sentence: Georgia Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker appeared to acknowledge a possible blowout in the primary as he dominates in the polls and invited his GOP opponents, their staff, and supporters to a unity celebration in an effort to bring everyone together on election day.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Georgia Republican Herschel Walker Invites GOP Opponents to Unity Celebration on Primary Day

sentence: In a teaser for an ABC "Nightline " report on the next seven days of GOP primaries that could dictate the fate of both the Senate and the House of Representatives, Republicans in Georgia express dismay at the inevitability that they will be saddled with former football player Herschel Walker as their nominee for an obtainable Senate seat.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: 'It's going to be a tough day': Georgia Republicans concerned over Herschel Walker's Senate run

sentence: Less than two months ago, State Agricultural Commissioner Gary Black was trailing former football star Herschel Walker in the Republican Senate primary when he told a rally in Putnam County that he didn't think there was any chance Walker could beat incumbent Democrat Raphael Warnock in the fall.
author: Bill Powell
title: Why Did It Take the GOP So Long to Panic About Herschel Walker?

sentence: Source: AP Photo/Ben Gray Less than an hour after the polls closed in Georgia on Tuesday night, former NFL player Herschel Walker, who was endorsed by former President Donald Trump, was declared the winner in the Republican primary by Decision Desk Headquarters.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Trump-Endorsed Herschel Walker Wins Georgia Senate Primary

author: Jacob Bliss
title: Herschel Walker Clinches Georgias U.S. Senate Republican Primary

sentence: ATLANTA (AP) Football great Herschel Walker, endorsed by former President Donald Trump, won Georgias GOP Senate primary.

title: Trump pick Herschel Walker wins Georgias Republican Senate primary
